dmca.title: Paying for the cause
dmca.body:
March 11, 2004


Dear [Recipient]

It has come to my attention that your attorney, Jolene Devries, has reproduced and disseminated copyrighted material from my website, http://www.profane-justice.org, on your behalf, as your legal representative. My website is protected under copyright laws. My copyright notice conforms with the requirements under Title 17 of the United States Code.		
	My license fee for reproduction and dissemination of my copyrighted materials is $5,000.00 per printed page per copy with conditions on the nature of the use. This is clearly stated on the documents you disseminated. Neither of you sought my permission to reproduce and disseminate my property. You did not request a license fee reduction or waiver. There is no fair use affirmative defense for your infringement. Your infringement is willful. Because Ms. Devries committed this infringement with your authority and on your behalf, you are liable.
	The total license fee incurred by your attorney
